title: Rocked by Her Devils
description: The Devils have returned with one torment me. They hate me.Five years ago, I ruined their lives.It was an accident.Who knew one photo could cause so much damage? Now, I’ve been assigned as a photographer for The Devils’ Salvation tour.Personally requested.More like demanded. Just me and three vicious, sinful, rockstars bent on vengeance.If I want to keep my demons at bay, I’ll have to endure their hell.I’ll take whatever they throw at me.They can try and break me.But I’m already broken.And the torment they put me through only makes me want it more. Jax, Maverick and Ansel.The three devils on my shoulder.Tempting, taunting and punishing. If we keep going down this path… None of us are making it out of this tour alive.Rocked by Her Devils is a dark why choose standalone with a HEA. This book contains dark content, please read the trigger warning at the beginning of the book for details.
author: Rosa Holland
